misdeed: A string of unsettling occurrences plagues a small village nestled in the mountains: sudden fits of madness, strange compulsions, and whispers of deals made with a whispering entity drive fear into the hearts of the inhabitants.
solution: The Vaesen is a Spertus, and it can only be removed by a ritualistic sacrifice of a dozen souls or by the afflicted devoting their life to the Church.

clues.description: The afflicted individuals exhibit unusual skills or talents, but at a terrible price, their behavior becoming erratic and unpredictable.
A peculiar antique snuff box, rumored to grant wishes, appears to be at the center of the disturbances, changing hands with alarming frequency.
Those who come into contact with the snuff box describe feeling a strange warmth emanating from it, followed by a whispering voice that promises power and fulfillment.
The villagers find strange symbols drawn on the doorsteps of those who have been afflicted, reminiscent of ancient runes or sigils.
A local priest notices that the holy water hisses and steams when brought near those affected by the entity, their presence seemingly anathema to the sacred.
An ancient text, discovered hidden in the church archives, speaks of a demonic entity that grants favors in exchange for souls, its influence spreading like a disease through a community.

plotTwist.description: The village outcast, seeking acceptance and belonging, has unwittingly become the Vaesenâ€™s host, its power amplifying his loneliness and desire for connection.
